name: Donut Ninja - Tappi Bear
description:
Donut Ninja - Tappi Bear Game Series 03
Support iOS4 Game Center Leaderboard and Achievement Points!!

Tappi Bear, the enemies are coming!
Show me your courage, feed them with Donuts!
Ninja Showdown!!

Can you defeat those Ninja Tappis?
Do you have enough Donuts?
Don't let the enemy bears and also the UFOs go,
Give them a Donut Head Shoot!

-- Features --
Highly addictive fast paced gameplay
Pick-up 'n Play and Endless level
Adorable graphic style and lovely characters and animations
Simple and solid controls
Zero loading time

Find more and more Tappi Bear Games here!!
www.TappiBear.com
www.Taplay.com
